title.narrative: 3.2 PARTNERSHIP FOR SOCIAL CHANGE

description.narrative: By 2016 at least 6 key national institutions and select community based social networks facilitate discourse and promote changes in key social norms and issues related to violence against children and women ( child marriage, corporal punishment and child labour), which contributes to Corporate External Relations And Partnerships, Communication And Resource Mobilization, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2016, deprived community members in 20 selected districts practice key life-saving, care and protective behavours, raised their demand for quality social services and promote social change with equity.

related-activity.ref: 5070/A0/04/003 PCR 3. PRACTICE KEY LIFE SAVING BEHAVIOU

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2016 at least 6 key national institutions and select community based social networks facilitate discourse and promote changesin key social norms and issues related to violence against children and women ( child marriage, corporal punishment and childlabour)

description.narrative: In 2016, over 900 child marriages were prevented through active community engagement and information dissemination and 116 public declarations took place to end child marriage at the union level. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2016

title.narrative: Number of Social Change Structures established at national level and in the 20 UNDAF districts

target.value: 2016:One national forum, one social Change chapter in 20 UNDAF districts, each to meet basic functionality criteria (elected body, terms of reference, action plans, minutes of meetings)

actual.value: 2016:Social Change Structure established at national level in 2014. At sub-national level, a structure was established in each of 7 districts and 21 upazilas in 2015. These are functional and implementing some of the key activities.

title.narrative: Number of Ward Development Committees in 3 upzaillas in 20 UNDAF districts facilitating community dialogues on corporal, punishment, child marriage, child labour (including child care and development)

target.value: 2016:Quarterly community dialogues, quarterly updates of community information Boards starting June 2013

actual.value: 2016:Social Change Structure established at national level in 2014. At sub-national level, a structure was established in each of 7 districts and 21 upazilas in 2015. These are functional and implementing some of the key activities.
